text: Q.7 A man has 7 relatives, 4 women and 3 men. His wife also has 7 relatives, 3 women and 4 men. The number of ways in which they can invite 3 women and 3 men so that 3 of them are the man’s relatives and 3 his wife’s is . ‘ 485 Correct Option Solution : 485 The number of persons in a selection may be of the following types: (i) Man’s relatives (0 males + 3 females) + wife’s relatives (3 males + 0 females) (ii) Man’s relatives (1 male + 2 females) + wife’s relatives (2 males + 1 female) (iii) Man’s relatives (2 males + 1 females) + wife’s relatives (1 male + 1 females) (iv) Man’s relative (3 males + 0 females) + wife’s relatives (0 males + 3 females) The required number of selections will be = C(3, 0) x C(4, 3) x C(4, 3) x C(3, 0) + C(3, 1) x C(4, 2) x C(4,2) x C(3, 1) + C(3, 2) x C(4,1) x C(4, 1) x C(3,2) + C(3, 3) x C(4, 0) x C(4, 0) x C(3, 3) =485 VIEW Anwser || COPY || MARK
